alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 12:23PM CDT until May 05 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... North central Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1223 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Altheimer, or 15 miles southwest of Stuttgart, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Altheimer... Holly Grove... Humphrey... Almyra... St. Charles... Palmer... Wabbaseka... Almyra Airport... Casscoe... Crocketts Bluff... Ragtown... Indian Bay... Pine City... Lawrenceville... Cross Roads in Monroe County... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
